text: Debra Janine "Debi" Thomas (born March 25, 1967) is an American former figure skater and physician. She is the 1986 World champion, 1988 Olympic bronze medalist and two-time U.S. national champion. She competed with Katarina Witt in the 1988 Calgary Olympics. Thomas was born in Poughkeepsie, New York. She grew up in San Jose, California. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:African-American sportspeople Category:1988 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:American figure skaters Category:People from Poughkeepsie, New York Category:Sportspeople from New York (state) Category:Sportspeople from San Jose, California Category:Living people
title: Debi Thomas
